query:
SELECT EXISTS(
    SELECT 1
    FROM (
        SELECT sender_id, receiver_id FROM UserFriendRequest
        UNION
        SELECT user_id AS `sender_id`, friend_id AS `receiver_id` FROM UserFriend
    ) AS Friend
    WHERE (sender_id, receiver_id) = (?, ?) OR (sender_id, receiver_id) = (?, ?)
) AS `exists: bool`
